English: I am going to take your blood pressure, temperature, and weight. Is that okay?
Spanish: Voy a tomar su presión arterial, temperatura y peso. ¿Está bien?

English: Are you okay if a student is in the room with us?
Spanish: ¿Está bien si un estudiante está en la sala con nosotros?

English: Do you have any questions or concerns at the moment?
Spanish: ¿Tiene alguna pregunta o inquietud en este momento?

English: Thank you very much for answering our questions
Spanish: Muchas gracias por responder nuestras preguntas

English: Would you like anything to eat or drink while you wait?
Spanish: ¿Le gustaría algo de comer o beber mientras espera?

English: Have you been here before?
Have you been to the hospital or emergency room recently?
Spanish: ¿Ha ido al hospital o a la sala de emergencias recientemente?

English: Do you have a history of _____?
Do you smoke?
Do you drink alcohol? If so, how often?
Spanish: ¿Toma alcohol? Si es así, ¿con qué frecuencia?

English: Could you please tell me your full name and date of birth?
Spanish: ¿Podría decirme su nombre completo y su fecha de nacimiento?

English: Can you please confirm your phone number and address?
Spanish: ¿Puede confirmar su número de teléfono y dirección, por favor?

English: Hi there, my name is ____ and I'll be taking care of you today.
Spanish: Hola, me llamo ____ y estaré a cargo de su cuidado hoy.

English: What is your name?
Come on in and have a seat wherever you would like
Who is your primary caretaker?
Are you allergic to anything?
Do you take any recreational drugs?
Are you currently taking any medications?
Are you pregnant?
What brings you in today?
How long have you been experiencing this issue?
On a scale of 1-10, how would you rate your pain?
Spanish: En una escala del 1 al 10, ¿cómo calificaría su dolor?

English: How are you feeling today?
